name: Daughters of Witches
goal: The goal of Daughters of Witches is to support the rights of women and non-binary persons. With our online store, we support entrepreneurs and their businesses, and on our social media platform, we support feminist artists, activists, writers and more.
interests: Communication, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Youth
euInitiatives:
We are interested in all EU initiatives that increase female labour market participation and the equal economic independence of women and men. We are also interested in the EU initiatives to support women's rights on social media, and their social media campaigns, such as the social media campaign NON.NO.NEIN campaign
â€” Say NO! Stop violence against women launched in 2017. We are also interested in the EU's efforts in combating cyber violence against women and the LGBTQI+ community (that was highlighted in the 2018 report on equality between women and men in the EU).
